snippet.title: Infinity Pinball - A Revolutionary Twist on the Pinball Genre!
snippet.description:
Are you ready for a new Pinball game with a twist? Infinity Pinball pays homage to the 16-bit side-scrolling shooters of yesteryear and turns the gameplay on its head. Executed in a nostalgic retro style, these infinitely long pinball tables live inside a virtual Pocket Game. You can continually play your ball up up up (and fall down down down) the table levels for endless fun as you win coins, collect unique balls and unlock new tables. 

Each infinite pinball table has its own original design theme, soundtrack and unique bash toys! Get your ball into the side pockets to change the bash toy and unlock a bonus stage where even more coins can be won!

Watch your hearts as you only get 3 lives per game!
